article_title: More leaving Lancaster County than moving in
article_text: Jeff Hawkes writes about social policy and the well-being of Lancaster County and its people for Lancaster Newspapers. He can be reached atÂ jhawkes@lnpnews.comÂ or (717) 481-6141.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , migration, coalition for sustainable housing, lancaster housing opportunity partnership, lancaster county planning commission, internal revenue service
article_metadata.author: JEFF HAWKES | Staff Writer

og.description: For the second straight year, more households left Lancaster County than moved in, foreshadowing trouble for the local economy if the shift continues and deepens.
